item.title: CandyShop Writeup
item.description: CandyShop Attachment Read the source code of the website, we’ll find out that it’s driven by express.js & pug template engine. Then we’ll find out the wrong usage of pug in the code: src/routes/shop.js router.post('/order', checkLogin, checkActive, async (req, res) => { let {username, candyname, address} = req.body let tpl_path...
